Package simzombie.engine

Class Summary
Agent Basic template for the Agent class
AgentType A storage class that holds information about the typings of agents AgentTypes are assigned unique identifiers when created, so each simulation will have their own unique collection of AgentTypes.
CommandLineRunner An alternative startup option to SimZombie which runs the application headless.
Parameters Contains all the standard parameters that all simulations executed in SimZombie should implement This class is Abstract, as is it recommended that simulation types extend this class to include parameters which are specific to that simulation only.
SavedSimulation Class that structures a Simulation in a way that it can be saved Simulation IO uses this class, which saves an ordered list of SavedStep objects which relate to the individual steps of a simulation.
SavedStep Stores ALL the information about a single step of a simulation When stored successively (as in SavedSimulation) they can be used to recreate a simulation
SavedStep.StepComparator Orders steps in a list based on their step number, which is their position with a simulation
SimCanvas GUI component that displays a simulation Is back buffered for smooth animation, but requires a call to Component.repaint() to update after the simulation has been updated
SimulationRunner  
SimZombie  
 

Enum Summary
Parameters.TimeOfDay This may be specific to zombie simulations only, but also may not.
